description.text:
NGINX Amplify is a tool for comprehensive monitoring that you can use to proactively detect and fix issues related to running and scaling NGINX-based applications.
Supported PHP versions are PHP 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 7.0, and 7.1.
To get an API key, create an account at Amplify website and copy your key from the start page.
description.short: NGINX Amplify is a tool for monitoring, proactively detecting and fixing issues related to running and scaling NGINX-based applications.
